API Reference

Scrape.py

class src.data_processing.scrape.Scrape(base, url, agent)

Scrape data from website

Parameters:

  • base (str) – Base URL of the webpage being searched

  • url (str) – Full URL of the webpage being searched

  • agent (str) – User accessing the webpage, used for authentication

load_data()

Format list of objects as json-formatted string

Returns:

json-formatted string of objects

Return type:

str

scrape_data(recent_entry)

Pull data from the webpage

Parameters:

  • recent_entry – Unique ID of the most recent entry pulled from the webpage

  • recent_entry – int

Student.py

class src.data_processing.student.Student

Unique student applicant object

format()

Format data on self as json-formatted string

Returns:

json-formatted string of student applicant

Return type:

str

Clean.py

class src.data_processing.clean.Clean(filename)

Cleans given data by processing it through a local LLM.

Parameters:

filename – File name to be run through LLM

clean_data()

Function runs file through local LLM to auto-detect programs and universities for each row. Creates a .txt file with original data and extended generated data.

Load_data.py

src.data_processing.load_data.clear_data()

For testing; empties database.

src.data_processing.load_data.load_data(dbname, user, password)

Load data from JSON file to database.

Parameters:

  • dbname (str) – Name of the database being accessed

  • user (str) – Username to access the database

  • password (str) – Password to access database with given username

src.data_processing.load_data.validate_entry(cursor, json_object)

Confirm entry is not already in database

Parameters:

  • cursor (refcursor) – Connection to database

  • json_object (json) – Entry to be checked for in database

Returns:

Determination whether the entry is unique

Return type:

bool

Query_data.py

class src.data_processing.query_data.Query(dbname, user, password)

Aggregate queries of applicant data.

param dbname:

Name of the database being accessed

type dbname:

str

param user:

Username to access the database

type user:

str

param password:

Password to access database with given username

type password:

str

run_query()

Queries data in database for analysis.

Returns:

Variables attached to self

Flask_app.py

src.flask_app.home()

Homepage of Flask App showing questions and results from database queries

Returns:

Homepage template

Return type:

html

src.flask_app.pull_data()

Initiate the sequence of scraping new data

Returns:

Homepage template

Return type:

html

src.flask_app.update_analysis()

Update the analysis on the homepage to reflect recently pulled data

Returns:

Homepage template

Return type:

html
